    Check if the position is in the region
    double
    distance(Position position)
    Return the distance between region and position If position is inside the region, return 0 (Note that this is not the same as the distance between the region and the center of the region) (Note this method is more expensive than Region.contains(Position) method when you just want to check if the position is inside the region)

      Check if the position is in the region
      Specified by:
      contains in interface Region
      Parameters:
      position - position to check
      Returns:

    • distance

      public double distance(Position position)
      Description copied from interface: Region
      Return the distance between region and position If position is inside the region, return 0 (Note that this is not the same as the distance between the region and the center of the region) (Note this method is more expensive than Region.contains(Position) method when you just want to check if the position is inside the region)
      Specified by:
      distance in interface Region
      Parameters:
      position - position
      Returns:
      distance between region and position (or 0 if position is inside the region)
